vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ACL._remove (ACL.sol#228-244):
	External calls:
	- _owners_set.addresses.pop() (ACL.sol#238-240)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _owners_set (ACL.sol#240-241)
	- _owners_set (ACL.sol#241-244)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ACL.remove (ACL.sol#172-185):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(_remove(who),removed address is not owner) (ACL.sol#178-182)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nonce (ACL.sol#185)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ACL.replace (ACL.sol#162-171):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(_remove(who),removed address is not owner) (ACL.sol#168-170)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pending_owner (ACL.sol#170-171)

ACL._remove (ACL.sol#228-244) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_owners_set.addresses.pop() (ACL.sol#238-240)
